title: HANRO Women's Cotton Deluxe Short Sleeve Bigshirt
features: Short sleeve cotton bigshirt with scoop neckline and subtle cotton voile trim

description: Modern and versatile, the cotton deluxe short sleeve big shirt is tailored from soft 100 percent mercerized cotton and combines novel styling with understated functionality. This big shirt features subtle woven voile trim at the scoop neckline, chest pocket and short sleeves, and falls slightly above the knee on most.
